readable.title: 300274198_eefd8e057e
readable.content: A brown and white dog licking its chops while sitting in a green room with a tile floor . a brown dog is licking its lips whilst standing next to two empty feeding bowls . A brown pitbull licks its chops as it waits for the empty food bowl to be filled . A dog is licking its lips while sitting beside two feeding tray . A dog licking his lips in a room with no food in its dish .
